conbody.p: Katalon Studio provides the Windows record utility that allows you to record and playback actions performed in a Windows desktop application. With this utility, you can quickly create a test case, and later manually enhance the test.
This article introduces you to the components of the Windows record utility in Katalon Studio.

ul.li: WinAppDriver is running on the test machine. To learn how to set up and run WinAppDriver, see: Set up WinAppDriver.
